name: I Can Blow up an Isekai World With Just One Punch
nutshell: During the years of the break of dawn, mankind had to rebuild from nothing, spending a long time in order to recover society’s economic crisis, at the same time many dojo started sprouting out of no where similarly to how grasses grow after rainy seasons. To the tens of thousands of citizen that reside within the city of Zhong Hai, the most important thing is the annual boxing tournament. Becoming the champion is every youth’s ultimate dream.

name: Shiina Yuu wa Naiteru Onna ni shika Yokujou shinai
Haikyuu!! - Luminary (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairings: Kageyama/Hinata, Hinata/Kageyama
Two weeks into Kageyama’s and Hinata’s relationship, Tsukishima notices that Hinata has lost some of the aggression in his spikes, making him easier to block. Concerned that their bedroom positions–where Hinata has always been on bottom–have led to this loss of force, Kageyama decides to do what any good boyfriend in his situation would do: let Hinata top him.

name: Dragon Heroes - Crow
nutshell:
Deep in endless forests demons and ghosts dwell. Some of them haunt the place, some of them eat random passers-by and some of them plant potatoes…

Original Webmanga (English) by a Russian author from Tapastic.

name: Ai wa Okujou no Karasu ni Oyobu
nutshell: Манга сингл про любовь между двумя девушками

name: noe67 Warawanai Sekusaloid
nutshell: A story about an android with human emotions and a silly machinist.

name: Rabukome no Baka
nutshell: Sakura Suzu is a rookie shoujo mangaka who doesn't seem to meet success. One day, her editor who has worked with her since her debut is transferred. The new editor in charge is a handsome guy who used to work in the seinen departement. It's love at first sight for Sakura but he doesn't think the same…

name: Disney Twisted Wonderland - 2-kaime hon (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Deuce Spade x Ace Trappola
Deuce and Spade tries doing it once again. Though something else blossoms?

name: Kadafuu Raiden
nutshell:
Healing sicknesses and exterminating ghosts are his specialties!
The story of the renowned doctor who has alighted to the earth, Hua Tuo’s great accomplishments!
The setting is in China during the period of the Three Kingdoms! The one who manages to cure ailments, and even perform exorcisms and extermine monsters with ease is the great doctor Hua Tuo. And he asks not for monetary payment, but for a recital of the prayer, “Namuamidahba.” What could the true goal of Hua Tuo be as he travels with his two mysterious companions, Ri Yao and Yue Jing, who are constantly trying to keep him in check…?

name: Serendipity
nutshell: About a rich man unable to open his heart to others and a woman who is poor but lives life filled with love and hope.

name: The Saintess Has a Showdown
nutshell:
The Saintess of the Sea Concubine Palace, in her summoning ceremony, summoned the lowest ranked companion as her soul pet - the water elemental.
"But how could a Saintess only summon a water spirit? It must be something better, like the powerful water emperor!"
"I'm really just a normal rookie! Why'd you pick pick me to be your Saint?"

name: Digimon Xros Wars
nutshell: Taiki Kudo is an upbeat boy with a desire to help those in need, although he tends to overexert himself. One day, he hears the voice of a Digimon named Shoutmon who is on the verge of death. Wanting to help him, Taiki is given a Digivice known as a Xros Loader, and he and his friends Akari Hinomoto and Zenjiro Tsurugi are warped to the Digital World where they meet Shoutmon and his allies, Ballistamon, Starmon and the Pickmons. By using the power of the Xros Loader, Taiki can perform a DigiXros, which can fuse any of his allies together into different forms. Taiki and his friends use this ability to fight the forces of the Bagura Empire while crossing paths with teams Blue Flare and Twilight.

name: Toaru Saten no Skirt Flipping
nutshell:
A 4-koma about Saten from A Certain Scientific Railgun and her signature skirt flipping.
This was an official anthology chapter released in the Toaru Kagaku no Accelerator × Toaru Kagaku no Railgun Toaru Magazine.

name: Bokura wa Souyatte Iromeiteiku
nutshell:
About the relationship between a senpai and a kouhai.

Links:

Melonbooks (JP)

name: Otome Youkai Zakuro
nutshell: It's the Meiji Era in a slightly alternate Japan, and the Gregorian calendar has just come into effect. The fox-eared girls living in the youkai part of town are about to be put to work together with a delegation of young human soldiers, to promote interracial understanding. So what will happen when Zakuro's strong personality collides with human sensibilities?

name: Monster Hunter - Malfestio's Feeding Plan (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A MonHun doujin about a hungry Malfestio.

name: The Strange Tales of Oscar Zahn
nutshell: Follow the journey of the world's greatest paranormal investigator - Oscar Zahn. Friend to lost souls, enemy of evil, he may lack a body but that doesn't mean he's missing a heart!

name: Konya, Hokenshitsude guchaguchani
nutshell:
How obscene… At school I am said to be 'straight-laced' and 'not interested in obscene topics' but…every night at home I play with myself to the infirmary nurse Shiraha-sensei. Just today I had a delusion of him extending his hand under the table while saying 'you sure love being teased' while teasing my sensitive spot…which I came to… Pervert… I'm such a pervert!!!
From Chibi Manga.

name: Yuuyake Trip
nutshell: High schooler Ninamori Akane is assigned by the newspaper club to report on local places that are rumored to be haunted. She asks the new transfer student, Amemura Fujino, to join her, and together they discover the simple truths behind the spooky stories. Their friendship grows as they explore their town of labyrinthine paths and endless stairways. [Seven Seas]

name: Setsuna Yuki
nutshell:
Nagisa is a normal high school student. For winter vacation, it's decided that they will go snowboarding. On the ski slopes, she watches a guy who is really good at the sport. She tries it out, but gets herself into a little accident, causing her to return to the lodge. There, she meets Soushi, the guy from before. It's her chance! Will she somehow be able to ask Soushi to teach her?
Also contains two extras:


First-Rate King


Bitter Boy Cafe

name: Sayabito
nutshell:
This is a post-war world where human-shaped weapons called scabbards exists.
Cuifer and Livia are traveling government agents looking after the declining scabbard population, checking on their living condition, potential abuses and the worthiness of their masters.

name: Ensa no Kusabi
nutshell: A story of unprecedented rebellion begins when the destinies of the two, a lonely manslayer, Asuka Asagiri, and a mysterious girl, Souki, intersect, guided by an "antique" that possesses a mysterious power. A slashing dark fantasy of rebellion against fate!

name: Himitsu na Kimi ni Koi o Shita
nutshell:
Shizuka Naoto doesn't intend to be the main actress. Everyone was so weird. Then a boy caught her attention… And together they started feeding a wild cat. But what will happen to them…?
Pt/Br:
"Você… está cheio de mistérios, mas mesmo assim… Tudo bem se me apaixonar por você?" Para a alegre Tachibana Yuu, Shizuka Naoto é um garoto cheio de mistérios. Mas, casualmente, ela descobre um dos seus "segredos", e agora… esses novos sentimentos que está experimentando… vão alcançar o Príncipe Misterioso?

name: The Girlfriend's Little Sister is Dangerous
Refund High School
nutshell: Do you want a refund on your life? Start earning karma at The Refund High School to reincarnate as an ideal version of you.

name: Samurai Spirits - Haoumaru Jigokuyuki
nutshell:
Samurai Spirits: Haohmaru Jigokuyuki is a 1993 manga written by Shiro Ohno. The story takes place before the events of the first Samurai Shodown game and leads to second series by the same author where it adapts the first two games.
It follows Haohmaru, Charlotte, Nakoruru, Hanzo and Ukyo as they get face to face for the first time, with the resurrected Amakusa. The series is notable for introducing, for the first time, a demon samurai who looks exactly like Haohmaru, a concept that will later be used by SNK for the story of Rasetsumaru in Samurai Shodown V.

name: Tonari no Onigo
nutshell: Oniko, as she is called, is a demon who has a severe interest in humans and one day decides she wants to become a human herself!
